mainfeatures: 16.0 Megapixels (Max. Resolution, interpolation) 5.0 Megapixels CMOS sensor 1080P(30fps) Video recording Support 600x zoom (5x Optical zoom, 120x digital zoom) 3.0 Inch TFT LCD touch display (16:9) Support SD/SDHC/SDXC up to 64GB Use li-ion battery
imageresolution: High 4608 x 3456 (16M pixels)(interpolated); Standard 2592 x 1944(5M pixels); Low 2048 x 1536(3M pixels)
specifications: Image sensor: 5 Mega pixel CMOS sensor Operation modes: Video record, Photo record Lens: Auto Focus Lens(F3.5-F3.7 f=5.0-25.0mm) Focus range: Macro Mode:1cm~10cm. Nomal Mode:1cm~infinite Zoom: 1x ~ 600x (5x Optical zoom and 120x digital zoom) Shutter: Electronic LCD monitor: 3 Inch touch LCD Display (16:9) Storage media: Built-in 128MB memory (partial memory is used for firmware code and sofe ware); SD/SDHC/SDXC card slot support(up to 64GB) Image resolution: High 4608 x 3456 (16M pixels)(interpolated); Standard 2592 x 1944(5M pixels); Low 2048 x 1536(3M pixels) Video resolution: FHD(1080P 30) 1920X1080(30fps); HD+(720p 60) 1280X720(30fps); HD(720p 30) 1280X720(30fps); VGA(640X480)640X480(30fps) White balance: Auto/Manual(Daylight,Fluorescent,Tungsten) ISO: Auto / 800 / 1600 / 3200 / 6400 Self-timer: 10 seconds delay Flash: Flash Auto/Red-Eye-Reduction/Flash Off File format: Photo:JPG; Video:AVI Image play: Single image.Slideshow PC interface: Mini USB 2.0 port TV out: NTSV/PAL selectable,HDMI Battery: Lithium-ion rechargeable battery Dimension: 126 x 57 x 60mm Weight: 330g(without battery)
storagemedia: Built-in 128MB memory (partial memory is used for firmware code and sofe ware); SD/SDHC/SDXC card slot support(up to 64GB)
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camcorder HD-600 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV Cable 1 x CD-ROM software disc 1 x Camera Pouch 1 x User Manual
